description: With hearty beef mince and cheesy mash, this cottage pie recipe is extra comforting. Plus, it only takes 15 minutes to prep â€”perfect for a cosy midweek dinner.
keywords: Shepherd's & cottage pie,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Potato,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Mince,Peanut free
name: Classic Cottage Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place potatoes into a saucepan and cover with cold water. Bring to the boil over high heat. Cook for 15 minutes or until tender. Drain. Add milk and butter. Season, then mash until smooth.

HowToTip.tipText: Make double the quantity of the mince mixture and freeze in an airtight container for next time.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add onion, carrot and celery. Cook for 6 minutes or until soft. Add mince and cook, stirring with a wooden spoon to break up mince, for 10 minutes or until browned. Add tomato paste, tomatoes and 1/3 cup water. Stir and bring to the boil. Simmer for 10 minutes or until thickened. Stir in corn and peas.

Preheat grill on high. Transfer mince mixture to an 8-cup capacity baking dish. Spread mash over mince mixture. Sprinkle with cheese and place under grill for 7 minutes or until cheese is melted and golden. Serve.
